p: COS7 cells were cultured in phenol-red free DMEM (Gibco) supplemented with 2 mM GlutaMAX (Gibco), 50 U/ml penicillin, 50 μg/ml streptomycin (Penstrep, Gibco) and 10% fetal bovine serum (FBS; Gibco). Cells were grown at 37°C in a 5% CO 2 humidified incubator. Cell lines have not been authenticated.
